task.title: Deregister Object Storage Gateways (OSGs)
task.shortdesc: You can de-register multiple registered Object Storage Gateways (OSGs) with the Eucalyptus Cloud Controller (CLC)

context.p: To deregister an Object Storage Gateway:

step.cmd: Use the euca-conf command with the name of the OSG to deregister each OSG. For example:
